class.name: MavenArtifactDependencyTrigger
class.description: A [trigger](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Configuring+Maven+Triggers#ConfiguringMavenTriggers-MavenArtifactDependencyTrigger) running builds when there is a modification of the maven dependency content.

function.name: mavenArtifact

param.name: groupId
param.description: A maven group identifier to the watched artifact belongs to

param.name: version
param.description: A [version or version range](https://confluence.jetbrains.com/display/TCDL/Configuring+Maven+Triggers#ConfiguringMavenTriggers-versionRanges) of the artifact

param.name: type
param.description: A type of the watched artifact. By default, the type is "jar".

param.name: classifier
param.description: Optional classifier of the watched artifact.

param.name: repoId
param.description: Maven repository ID to match authentication from applied maven settings

param.name: skipIfRunning
param.description: Do not trigger a build if currently running builds can produce this artifact

param.name: userSettingsSelection
param.description: Use one of the predefined settings files or provide a custom path. By default, the standard Maven settings file location is used.

param.name: userSettingsPath
param.description: The path to a user settings file
